sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(SUM (star_after) - SUM (star_before),0) AS totalStar FROM stars WHERE user_domain = #userDomain# AND TO_CHAR (created_date, 'MM') LIKE TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 1, 'MM')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT emp.user_domain AS userDomain, emp.first_name || ' ' || emp.last_name AS employeeName, (SELECT NVL (SUM (s.star_after) - SUM (s.star_before), 0) FROM stars s WHERE emp.user_domain = s.user_domain(+)
TO_CHAR (s.created_date, 'MM') LIKE TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 1, 'MM')
TO_CHAR (s.created_date, 'MM') LIKE TO_CHAR (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')
) AS totalStar FROM employees emp WHERE emp.flag = 'ACTIVE' AND emp.user_domain NOT IN (SELECT r.user_domain FROM employee_role r WHERE r.role_id IN ('HBU')) ORDER BY totalStar DESC, employeeName) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT emp.user_domain AS userDomain, emp.first_name || ' ' || emp.last_name AS employeeName, (SELECT NVL (SUM (s.star_after) - SUM (s.star_before), 0) FROM stars s WHERE emp.user_domain = s.user_domain(+)
TO_CHAR (s.created_date, 'MM') LIKE TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 1, 'MM')
TO_CHAR (s.created_date, 'MM') LIKE TO_CHAR (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')
) AS totalStar FROM employees emp WHERE emp.flag = 'ACTIVE' AND UPPER(EMP.ORGANIZATION_CODE) = UPPER(#organizationCode#) AND emp.user_domain NOT IN (SELECT r.user_domain FROM employee_role r WHERE r.role_id IN ('HBU')) ORDER BY totalStar DESC, employeeName) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT picture AS profilePicture from employees WHERE user_domain=#employeeDomain#
SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalClaim FROM assignments WHERE assign_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('claim')
SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalRFA FROM assignments WHERE report_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('rfa') AND assignment_category = 'ASSIGNMENT'
SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalRFAself FROM assignments WHERE report_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('rfa') AND assignment_category = 'SELF ASSIGNMENT'
SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalCorrection FROM assignments WHERE assign_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('correction') AND assignment_category = 'ASSIGNMENT'
SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalCorrectionself FROM assignments WHERE assign_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('correction') AND assignment_category = 'SELF ASSIGNMENT'
SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalClaim FROM assignments WHERE assign_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('claim') AND flag='INACTIVE'
SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalRFA FROM assignments WHERE report_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('rfa') AND assignment_category = 'ASSIGNMENT' AND flag='INACTIVE'

SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalRFAself FROM assignments WHERE report_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('rfa') AND assignment_category = 'SELF ASSIGNMENT' AND flag='INACTIVE'

SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalCorrection FROM assignments WHERE assign_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('correction') AND assignment_category = 'ASSIGNMENT' AND flag='INACTIVE'

SELECT COUNT (task_code) AS totalCorrectionself FROM assignments WHERE assign_to = #session.user_domain# AND UPPER(current_status) = UPPER('correction') AND assignment_category = 'SELF ASSIGNMENT' AND flag='INACTIVE'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM seqnumb, a.* FROM ( SELECT to_char((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code),'DD/MM/YYYY, HH24:MI') AS assignmentDate, TO_CHAR ((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code), 'YYYY-MM-DD, HH24:MI') AS claimDate, a.task_code AS taskCode, a.assignment_category AS assignmentCategory, e.first_name || ' ' || e.last_name AS fullName, to_char(a.updated_date,'DD/MM/YYYY, HH24:MI') AS createdDate, to_char(a.assignment_due_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS assignmentDueDate, a.current_status AS currentStatus, a.flag AS flag FROM assignments a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.report_to = e.user_domain WHERE a.assign_to = #userDomain# AND a.current_status = 'CLAIM'
LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%')
(LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
(LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
assignment_due_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY')
ORDER BY flag DESC, claimDate DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE seqnumb >= #start#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM assignments a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.assign_to = e.user_domain WHERE a.assign_to = #userDomain# AND a.current_status = 'CLAIM'
LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%')
(LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
(LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
assignment_due_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM seqnumb, a.* FROM ( SELECT to_char((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code),'DD/MM/YYYY, HH24:MI') AS assignmentDate, TO_CHAR ((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code), 'YYYY-MM-DD, HH24:MI') AS claimDate, a.task_code AS taskCode, a.assignment_category AS assignmentCategory, e.first_name || ' ' || e.last_name AS fullName, to_char(a.updated_date,'DD/MM/YYYY, HH24:MI') AS createdDate, to_char(a.assignment_due_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS assignmentDueDate, a.current_status AS currentStatus, a.flag AS flag FROM assignments a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.assign_to = e.user_domain WHERE a.assign_to = #userDomain# AND a.current_status = 'CORRECTION' AND assignment_category = 'ASSIGNMENT'
LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%')
(LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
(LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
assignment_due_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY')
ORDER BY flag DESC, claimDate DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE seqnumb >= #start#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM assignments a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.assign_to = e.user_domain WHERE a.assign_to = #userDomain# AND a.current_status = 'CORRECTION' AND assignment_category = 'ASSIGNMENT'
LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%')
(LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM seqnumb, a.* FROM ( SELECT to_char((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code),'DD/MM/YYYY, HH24:MI') AS assignmentDate, TO_CHAR ((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code), 'YYYY-MM-DD, HH24:MI') AS claimDate, a.task_code AS taskCode, a.assignment_category AS assignmentCategory, e.first_name || ' ' || e.last_name AS fullName, to_char(a.updated_date,'DD/MM/YYYY, HH24:MI') AS createdDate, to_char(a.assignment_due_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS assignmentDueDate, a.current_status AS currentStatus, a.flag AS flag FROM assignments a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.assign_to = e.user_domain WHERE a.assign_to = #userDomain# AND a.current_status = 'CORRECTION' AND assignment_category = 'SELF ASSIGNMENT'
LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%')
(LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
(LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
assignment_due_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY')
ORDER BY flag DESC, claimDate DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE seqnumb >= #start#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM seqnumb, a.* FROM ( SELECT to_char((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code),'DD/MM/YYYY, HH24:MI') AS assignmentDate, TO_CHAR ((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code), 'YYYY-MM-DD, HH24:MI') AS claimDate, a.task_code AS taskCode, a.assignment_category AS assignmentCategory, e.first_name || ' ' || e.last_name AS fullName, to_char(a.updated_date,'DD/MM/YYYY, HH24:MI') AS createdDate, to_char(a.assignment_due_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS assignmentDueDate, a.current_status AS currentStatus, a.flag AS flag FROM assignments a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.assign_to = e.user_domain WHERE a.report_to = #userDomain# AND a.current_status = 'RFA' AND assignment_category = 'ASSIGNMENT'
LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%')
(LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
(LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
assignment_due_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DD/MM/YYYY')
ORDER BY flag DESC, claimDate DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE seqnumb >= #start#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM assignments a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.assign_to = e.user_domain WHERE a.report_to = #userDomain# AND a.current_status = 'RFA' AND assignment_category = 'SELF ASSIGNMENT'
LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%')
(LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))
(LOWER(a.task_code) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(a.assignment_category) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.first_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%') OR LOWER(e.last_name) LIKE LOWER ('%$keyword$%'))

SELECT a.task_code AS taskCode, TO_CHAR((SELECT MAX(d.claim_date) FROM detail_claim_assignments d WHERE d.task_code = a.task_code),'DD/MM/YYYY') AS assignmentDate, TO_CHAR(a.assignment_due_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS assignmentDueDate, a.assignment_type AS assignmentType, a.assign_to AS assignTo, e.first_name || ' ' || e.last_name AS assignToFullName, a.report_to AS reportTo, e2.first_name || ' ' || e2.last_name AS reportToFullName, a.reff_task_code AS reffTaskCode, a.description AS description FROM assignments a, employees e, employees e2 WHERE a.task_code = #taskCode# AND a.assign_to = e.user_domain(+) AND a.report_to = e2.user_domain(+)
